marklogic.body:
Hair woes are such the worst! I have chin-length layers that dry all wavy and curly, flipping out every which way. I use 's Curl Sculpting Cream-Gel -- because I'm cheap and afraid of anything more expensive -- and it helps a bit. I wish I could do more than just "live with" my hair. I want to respect it and treat it right but I'm at a loss.
I've tried shampoo for curly hair but I have dandruff and Always end up Itching going back to Head and Shoulders.Â I've also tried not washing my hair every other day but after just one night it becomes a greasy, dirty-looking mess and all the curl gets smooshed out while I sleep. Blurgh.
